entry.summary: Trump promised in 2016 and 2024 to undo deindustrialization from globalization and free trade, with tariffs as his main tool. Can it work?

entry.title: Introducing sub-issues: Enhancing issue management on GitHub
entry.summary:
Explore the iterative development journey of GitHub's sub-issues feature. Learn how we leveraged sub-issues to build and refine sub-issues, breaking down larger tasks into smaller, manageable ones.

The post Introducing sub-issues: Enhancing issue management on GitHub appeared first on The GitHub Blog.

author.name: The latest from GitHub's engineering team - The GitHub Blog

entry.title: Simplifying Code Documentation with Amazon Q Developer
entry.summary: In the fast-paced world of software development, maintaining comprehensive documentation often falls to the bottom of priority lists in favor of delivering functionality. Amazon Q Developer’s /doc agent changes this equation by automating README generation and updates. With this tool, the variable of time spent producing documentation is reduced to the point that it’s no longer […]

entry.title: Simple, scalable, and global: Containers are coming to Cloudflare Workers in June 2025
entry.summary: Cloudflare Containers are coming this June. Run new types of workloads on our network with an experience that is simple, scalable, global and deeply integrated with Workers.

entry.title: A global virtual private cloud for building secure cross-cloud apps on Cloudflare Workers
entry.summary: We’re announcing Workers VPC: a global private network that allows applications deployed on Cloudflare Workers to connect to your legacy cloud infrastructure.

entry.title: Startup Program update: empowering every stage of the startup journey
entry.summary: Cloudflare’s Startup Program offers up to $250,000 in credits for companies building on our Developer Platform across 4 tiers: $5,000, $25,000, $100,000, and $250,000.

entry.title: How we simplified NCMEC reporting with Cloudflare Workflows
entry.summary: We transitioned to Cloudflare Workflows to manage complex, multi-step processes more efficiently. This shift replaced our National Center for Missing & Exploited Children (NCMEC) reporting system.

entry.title: Announcing up to 85% price reductions for Amazon S3 Express One Zone
entry.summary: Amazon S3 Express One Zone announces significant price reductions, including reducing pricing for storage by 31%, PUTs by 55%, and GETS by 85%. In addition, S3 Express One Zone has reduced its per-gigabyte data upload and retrieval charges by 60% and now applies these charges to all bytes rather than just portions of requests exceeding 512 kilobytes.

entry.title: Making Super Slurper 5x faster with Workers, Durable Objects, and Queues
entry.summary: We re-architected Super Slurper from the ground up using our Developer Platform — leveraging Cloudflare Workers, Durable Objects, and Queues — and improved transfer speeds by up to 5x.

entry.title: R2 Data Catalog: Managed Apache Iceberg tables with zero egress fees
entry.summary: R2 Data Catalog is now in public beta: a managed Apache Iceberg data catalog built directly into your R2 bucket.

entry.title: Sequential consistency without borders: how D1 implements global read replication
entry.summary: D1, Cloudflare’s managed SQL database, announces read replication beta. Here's a deep dive of the read replication implementation and how your queries can remain consistent across all regions.

entry.title: Just landed: streaming ingestion on Cloudflare with Arroyo and Pipelines
entry.summary: We’ve just shipped our new streaming ingestion service, Pipelines — and we’ve acquired Arroyo, enabling us to bring new SQL-based, stateful transformations to Pipelines and R2.

entry.title: Make your apps truly interactive with Cloudflare Realtime and RealtimeKit
entry.summary: Announcing Cloudflare Realtime and RealtimeKit, a complete toolkit for shipping real-time audio and video apps in days with SDKs for Kotlin, React Native, Swift, JavaScript, and Flutter.

entry.title: Introducing Cloudflare Secrets Store (Beta): secure your secrets, simplify your workflow
entry.summary: Securely store, manage and deploy account level secrets to Cloudflare Workers through Cloudflare Secrets Store, available in beta – with role-based access control, audit logging and Wrangler support.

entry.title: Cloudflare Snippets are now Generally Available
entry.summary: Cloudflare Snippets are now generally available, enabling fast, cost-free JavaScript-based HTTP traffic modifications across all paid plans.

entry.title: Network performance update: Developer Week 2025
entry.summary: Cloudflare has been tracking and comparing our speed with other top networks since 2021. Let’s take a look at how things have changed since our last update.

entry.title: Introducing Workers Observability: logs, metrics, and queries – all in one place
entry.summary: We’ve improved Observability for Workers by announcing the General Availability of Workers Logs and the introduction of the Query Builder to help you investigate log events across all of your Workers.

entry.title: Could LLMs help design our next medicines and materials?
entry.summary: A new method lets users ask, in plain language, for a new molecule with certain properties, and receive a detailed description of how to synthesize it.

entry.title: AWS announces Pixtral Large 25.02 model in Amazon Bedrock serverless
entry.summary: Mistral AI's multimodal model, Pixtral Large 25.02, is now available in Amazon Bedrock as a fully managed, serverless offering with cross-Region inference support, multilingual capabilities, and a 128K context window that can process images alongside text.

entry.title: Introducing Amazon Nova Sonic: Human-like voice conversations for generative AI applications
entry.summary: Amazon Nova Sonic is a new foundation model on Amazon Bedrock that streamlines speech-enabled applications by offering unified speech recognition and generation capabilities, enabling natural conversations with contextual understanding while eliminating the need for multiple fragmented models.

entry.title: Using the Amazon Q Developer command line transformation tool
entry.summary: In today’s rapidly evolving software landscape, maintaining and modernizing Java applications is a critical challenge for many organizations. As new Java versions are released and best practices evolve, the need for efficient code transformation becomes increasingly important. Amazon Q Developer transformation for Java using the Command Line Interface (CLI) presents a powerful alternative to integrated […]

entry.title: How UNiDAYS achieved AWS Region expansion in 3 weeks
entry.summary: In this post, we share how UNiDAYS achieved AWS Region expansion in just 3 weeks using AWS services.

entry.title: Amazon Bedrock Guardrails enhances generative AI application safety with new capabilities
entry.summary: Amazon Bedrock Guardrails introduces enhanced capabilities to help enterprises implement responsible AI at scale, including multimodal toxicity detection, PII protection, IAM policy enforcement, selective policy application, and policy analysis features that customers like Grab, Remitly, and KONE are leveraging to standardize safeguards across generative AI applications.

entry.title: Your frontend, backend, and database — now in one Cloudflare Worker
entry.summary: You can now deploy static sites and full-stack applications on Cloudflare Workers. Framework support for React Router v7, Astro, Vue and more are generally available today and Cloudflare Vite plugin.

entry.title: Deploy your Next.js app to Cloudflare Workers with the Cloudflare adapter for OpenNext
entry.summary: With the 1.0-beta release of the Cloudflare adapter for OpenNext, you can host your Next.js 14 and 15 applications on Cloudflare Workers.

entry.title: Pools across the sea: how Hyperdrive speeds up access to databases and why we’re making it free
entry.summary: Hyperdrive, Cloudflare's global connection pooler, relies on some key innovations to make your database connections work. Let's dive deeper, in celebration of its availability for Free Plan customers.

entry.title: Build global MySQL apps using Cloudflare Workers and Hyperdrive
entry.summary: MySQL comes to Cloudflare Workers and Hyperdrive: MySQL drivers and ORMs are now compatible with Workers runtime, and Hyperdrive allow you to connect to your regional database from Workers.

entry.title: Amazon Nova Reel 1.1: Featuring up to 2-minutes multi-shot videos
entry.summary: Amazon Nova Reel 1.1 enables the generation of multi-shot videos up to 2-minutes in length and style consistency across shots, and quality and latency improvements over Amazon Nova Reel 1.0.

entry.title: Converting embedded SQL in Java applications with Amazon Q Developer
entry.summary: As organizations modernize their database infrastructure, migrating from systems like Oracle to open source solutions such as PostgreSQL is becoming increasingly common. However, this transition presents a significant challenge: discovering and converting embedded SQL within existing Java applications to ensure compatibility with the new database system. Manual conversion of this code is time-consuming, error-prone, and […]

entry.title: Introducing the quick start experience for Amazon Q Developer Pro
entry.summary: For software developers, development teams and IT Professionals, the Amazon Q Developer Pro Tier is recommended.
